overview: This action-packed, completely unpredictable competition drew competitors from across the action sports world. Eleven teams of two riders battled it out. The event featured a purpose-built course designed by Nitro’s expert mechanic Hubert Rowland, with a new event format championed by Jarred "JT" Taylor, all set at Travis’ legendary Pastranaland home compound.
title: Pastranaland Pit Bike Championship 2020
